inn1.comm: starts with a back of length delivery outside off that Richards chops to backward point
length delivery shaping a touch away from the batsman, who is happy to defend this one
fuller and speared into legstump, blocked back to the bowler
first runs for West Indies, Billy Doctrove signals a wide after Langeveldt hurls a short bal well down the leg side
back on target, a touch overpitched, on middle and off, watchful defence from the batsman
a touch shorter, on middle and leg, poked toward point, Richards wants the single, but Gayle wisely declines
lovely shot to bring up the first runs off the bat, length ball just outside off, Richards stands tall and crunches it past extra cover
starts off with a loopy full delivery outside off, Gayle defends lazily
keeps it full and outside off, Gayle leaves it to the keeper
overpitched again, on the pads this time, tucked towards midwicket
surprises Gayle with short ball, blocked off the back foot
big appeal for lbw after Gayle is struck in front of the stumps, but there was a big inside edge which the umpire spotted
ends the over with a good delivery, bends his back to get it to lift outside off, Gayle sways out of the way
Langeveldt also pitches it short, Richards pulls it but not with very good timing towards deep square leg
on the pads this time, defended to the leg side
nice and tight, length ball on middle and off, forward defense from the batsman
on legstump, flicked towards midwicket where it is smartly fielded by Miller
mistimed drive towards mid-on this time
end of a tidy over from Langeveldt, short of length and outside off, defended with soft hands
Gayle happy to shoulder arms to a length ball outside off
Tsotsobe gets the outside edge as Gayle looks to defend without moving his feet much, it was outside off and the edge flies past the vacant third slip to third man
back of length and on middle and leg, defended towards the off side

not where he intended it to go but he'll take take the six runs, a short ball, Richards goes for his favoured pull, gets a top edge which swirls over the keeper and all the way to the advertising hoardings directly behind
driven firmly off the front foot towards cover
Richards is foxed by the change of pace, Tsotsobe sliding his fingers across the seam, Richards checks his shot and the ball lobs over the bowler and lands safely short of mid-off
Gayle leaves that one by playing inside the line of a delivery that angles across him
trademark Gayle, clubbed over the bowler's head for four, back of length ball just outside off, Gayle steadies himself and punches it down the ground
four more, not as convincing this time, gets on the front foot and drives uppishly, clears Amla at mid-off before racing off for four
keeps it full, on the pads and that's clipped to backward square leg
overpitched just outside off, defended towards the off side
slower delivery to end the over, Gayle is happy to defend
bottom hand comes off the bat as Richards defends a short of length ball on middle stump
timing's not too good again from Richards as he pulls a short ball towards midwicket, the ball nearly stops dead after landing in the deep midwicket region
fuller and just outside legstump, tucked down to backward square leg
an ugly swipe from Gayle, doesn't connect as Tsotsobe bangs in a short bal
on the shorter side again, Gayle shifts to the backfoot and defends towards cover
beautiful straight hit down the ground, length ball just outside off and that is caressed past the bowler for four
is on target straightaway, on a length on middle and off, blocked to the off side
on the pads this time, clipped towards short midwicket
Gayle backs away and swings the shortish ball past mid-on, where Graeme Smith makes a clumsy attempt to stop the ball but fails
cramps up Gayle by pitching the ball on middle and leg, tipped towards cover and a quick single is pinched
fullish and on the pads, whipped wide of mid-on by Richards
bouncer on legstump, Gayle stands tall and defends towards square leg
length ball outside off, Gayle flat bats it towards midwicket
back of length on middle, swung towards deep backward square leg
West Indies continue their bright start, Gayle backs away and slams the shortish ball towards cow corner for four
length ball on the pads, again Gayle is happy to take a single after smashing a boundary, this time he taps the ball towards midwicket to bring up the 50
length ball on offstump, defended towards short midwicket
shorter this time, on middle and leg, tucked in front of square leg
worked off the pads just behind square leg for a single
bends his knee as he unleashes a superb square cut to a shortish ball outside off, lovely stroke that
full and on the pads, flicked down to short fine leg
short of length and outside off, played with soft hands towards point
keeps it tight around off, defended to the off side
off the outside half of the bat, Richards was looking to drive through off but gets it down to third man for a single to end the over
feeding him plenty of width, Richards likes it there, slashing it for four behind point, Richards looking good here
much better delivery this, on offstump, Richards blocks back to the bowler
and gain, similar delivery is pushed towards mid-off this time
slanting it into middle stump, patted towards cover
so that's a good response from McLaren after giving away four off the first ball, this one is speared into middle and leg, hits the tops of Richards' pads as he looks to defend
full and outside off, Gayle jumps across the stumps and flicks the ball towards short fine
a yorker just outside off, Richards just about gets his bat down in time, gets an inside edge towards short fine, lucky to survive that
Gayle makes room and carves this one between cover and point, enough time to get two as the fielders chase

Morkel gets the breakthrough as he has all series, short of length ball on off, Gayle backed away and looked to strike it over cover but ends up slicing it, its a skier which Duminy gets under from cover to take a well-judged catch
a full ball on the pads is nicely clipped wide of mid-on for a couple
Morkel ends the over with a bouncer, Richards ducks under
good line and length from McLaren, blocked by Chanderpaul
angling across the batsman this time, left alone by Chanderpaul
tests him with the bouncer, Chanderpaul scrambles to get under it
back of length and outside off, defended towards the off side
fuller ball, Chanderpual again pushes it towards cover
and that completes the maiden, McLaren pegs away at off, Chanderpaul blocks it watchfully
short of length ball on off, defended to the off side
and again the ball is tapped towards cover, a short run-less spell here for the home side here
back of length ball, Richards looks to pull but is struck high on the pads
on middle and leg, more defense from Richards
on the pads this time, whipped to deep square leg where David Miller does the fielding
outside off and Chanders is happy to shoulder arms
a swing and a miss from Richards, a length ball shaping in towards offstump, Richards misses and the ball swishes dangerous past off
goes for the pull again, a bit of a top edge towards short fine
giving no room for Chanderpaul, who plays with soft hands towards point
slower ball from McLaren, very short, easy put away for Chanderpaul, who swats it over midwicket for four
down the leg side, Chanderpaul looks to swing it down fine past the keeper, but he can only help it along to de Villiers after a few bounces
outside off, Chanderpaul defends towards point
sliding down the leg side, hits Richards high on the pads and the ball trickles to fine leg

a massive mix-up there, Chanderpaul is lucky to survive here, he jumps across the stumps and whips the ball to square leg, there's a bit of a misfield by Morkel, Chanders is halfway down the track before he is sent back, he scrambles back as Morkel, on all fours after collecting the ball, throws it towards midwicket
defended towards the off side by Chanderpaul
a short ball angling across the batsman, who sways out of the line of the delivery
another short ball, again Chanderpaul gets out of the way
three in a row to end the over, one more short ball on middle and leg, zips through to the keeper
blocked to the leg side
down the leg side, de Villiers can't collect it cleanly, that should have been called a wide but isn't, strangely
blocked off the front foot towards backward square leg
on middle and off, turned towards midwicket for a single
overpitched outside off, Richards gets nicely onto the front foot and eases the ball to long-off
wide outside off, driven towards mid-off for a single to end the over
well outside off, Chanderpaul gets another single by punching the ball towards cover
strays onto the pads, Richards looks to glance it to fine leg, doesn't get bat on it, off the pads to fine leg
more legstump offerings, this time Richards gets bat on it guiding it to fine leg
Chandepaul is sent back though he wants a single after tapping the ball to the off side
gets the single this delivery, clips the ball behind square leg
super shot to end the over, Kallis drops short, Richards swivels and pulls that one powerfully to the midwicket boundary
length ball on the offstump, turned towards midwicket
poked towards the off side for a single
length ball outside off, driven down to mid-off
fullish and on legstump, gets down on one knee and sweeps towards deep backward square leg
turned to short fine leg for a single
a bit of turn for Botha, glanced towards short fine but no run on offer this time
a bit of width for Chanderpaul, who carves the ball behind point
nice and tight from Kallis, on offstump, defended back to the bowler
slanting down the leg side, Richards gets it fine down the leg side, and that races away for four despite Petersen's despairing dive
responds with a bouncer, batsman is happy to duck
on legstump, tucked towards midwicket
ends the over with a bouncer, Richards gets under that one easily
tossed up by Botha, outside off, Chanderpaul waltzes down the track and pushes it towards the off side
gets a leading edge this time as he looks to flick it, lands short of the bowler though
works the ball behind square leg to get a single
and that's Richards' half-century, flicked to midwicket for a single
drops it short, Chanderpaul slashes it behind point for another single
a bit of an outside edge, takes the ball towards short third man
starts with a full ball on off and middle, eased towards mid-on for a single that brings up the West Indies hundred
full and outside off, square driven over backward point for a single, there seemed to be time to take two there though, some lazy running from West Indies
the bouncer sails over Chanderpaul's head
appeal for lbw, that looked to be missing leg, hits the pads and rolls towards the keeper
down the leg side, easy pickings for Richards, worked to deep square leg

a one-handed drive from Richards gets him four, bottom hand comes off as he looks to drive over mid-on, hits high on the bat but Richards goes through with the swing of the bat to clear the man there to pick up a boundary
defended off the backfoot towards backward point
Chanderpaul continues to pick off the singles patiently, dabs this wide one towards cover
Richards goes for the pull, edges onto the pads
turns this one towards midwicket to get a comfortable single
one more for Chanderpaul, chopped behind point on being given some room
fired into legstump, driven crisply towards short midwicket, but can't beat the man there
Richards is hurried into his defence as Botha sends in a flat delivery, that was 102kmh
full ball on offstump, defended to the leg side by Chanderpaul
fuller length delivery sliding into the pads, Chanderpaul moves across to flick and misses it
just outside off, opens the face to guide it towards third man
clipped down to fine leg for one more single
that's the wicket South Africa are looking for, a short of length ball outside off, Richards goes for the drive and despite hitting it well he can't get it past a driving Graeme Smith at short cover
backs away and carves it towards sweeper cover for a single
spins in after pitching outside off, defended by Dwayne Bravo to the leg side
Chanderpaul flicks it to midwicket to get his 16th single of the innings
flighted delivery, blocked back to the bowler
shuffles across and defends it towards midwicket for a single
a leading edge prompts cries of 'Catch it' but it drops well short of the bowler
Bravo is greeted with a bouncer by Tsotsobe, batsman gets under it
fuller and just outside off, Bravo opens the face to guide it towards backward point, sent back by Chanderpaul
opens the face of the bat to guide the ball past the keeper through the vacant slip region
length ball just outside off, Bravo moves across and taps the ball towards midwicket
shortish ball just outside off, Bravo jumps and stylishly carves the ball towards deep backward point
length ball outside off, Bravo works it down to third man for a single to end the over
Botha keeps it tight around off, cautious defence from Bravo
spins down the leg side, Bravo gets it to short fine
another dot ball, this was flat and full, blocked back to the bowler
full and on the pads, punched towards mid-on for a single
flighted delivery, on a length just outside off, Chanderpaul takes a couple of steps down the pitch and pushes the ball towards mid-on
short of length ball just outside off, defended to the off side
slow and short on legstump, helped along by Chanderpaul to fine leg
Bravo calls for two immediately after he shuffles across and clips the ball towards deep backward square leg, Bravo is quick and he makes it back in time
bouncer from Langeveldt, Bravo gets under that one
appeal for lbw, Bravo gets across a long way to try to flick the ball but is struck high on the pads, too high to be given lbw
stands tall and punches the ball from offstump towards mid-on and scrambles a single
short of length and into offstump, pushed towards mid-off
a touch shorter than the previous delivery, Bravo wanted to pull that one, gets a bottom edge onto his thigh pad and then rolls towards the keeper
fuller and outside off, driven towards cover
length ball on offstump, Chanderpaul punches it towards Morkel at mid-off, who misfields to allow an extra run
short delivery outside off, Chanderpaul pulls it towards square leg for a single
Bravo moves across the stumps and turns the ball towards midwicket but doesn't get a run
length ball just outside off, driven firmly towards cover
a short ball which he looks to pull, gets a bottom edge towards deep backward square leg
an eye-catching pull from Bravo, swivels as he sends that shortish ball towards deep square leg

missed run-out chance, big mix-up after David Miller dives and stops the ball at cover, Chanderpaul was well short if there had been a direct hit at the non-striker's end, Langeveldt was a bit slow to get back to the stumps there and the attempted direct hit misses
rounds off the over with a single towards point
Bravo moves across and eases the ball towards wide mid-on
a wristy drive towards long-on for a single by Bravo
short of length and angling across the batsman, who punches the ball towards mid-off
width for Chanderpaul this time, slapped towards backward point
and another dot ball as McLaren keeps pegging away around that offstump, defended towards short midwicket
full and wide outside off, guided towards backward point to end an over in which only one run is scored
flat delivery, fullish on off, eased down to long-on by Bravo
another full delivery is clipped behind square leg for one more
Bravo works this one from around off towards midwicket
gives this one a bit of air, on middle stump, Chanderpaul guides it towards cover
a low full toss, driven back to the bowler
another flighted delivery, Dwayne Bravo gets forward and clips it straight to midwicket
short of length ball is carved towards cover by Chanderpaul
slanting down the leg side, off the pads towards the keeper
beautiful stroke to break the boundary drought, Bravo is extremely stylish when at his best, this was a full delivery on legstump, whipped behind deep square leg for four
shortish offcutter, Bravo plays it off the front foot, luckily for him he doesn't time it too well so the lofted on-drive lands short of long-on
tucked round the corner for one more
ends a good over for the West Indies by jumping across the stumps and flicking the ball to deep backward square leg, hustles back for the second
flighted and full outside off, squeezed towards point
fires this one into legstump, Bravo whips it towards the leg side
tossed up by Botha, down the leg side, Chanderpaul reverse-paddles it to short fine
fullish on middle and leg, Bravo charges down the track, has to adjust for the line of the delivery, he does and tucks it towards midwicket
down the leg side, Chanderpaul is down the track, he gets it away towards square leg
width for Chanderpaul, he pokes the ball towards point for a single to end the over
length ball outside off, Chanderpaul looks to lash it towards long-on, mistimes his shot
shortish ball doesn't bounce too much, on legstump, Bravo just about gets bat on it as he manages to guide it to square leg
takes a couple of paces down the track and stabs the ball towards sweeper cover
singles continue to flow for the Windies, Bravo lifts his front leg as he helps a legstump ball down to deep backward square leg
short ball just outside off, Chanderpaul pulls it into the ground and towards deep midwicket to get a couple
length ball angling across, jabbed towards cover by Chanderpaul, and that's drinks
Bravo backs away and hacks the ball uppishly towards mid-off
back of length and outside off, Chanderpaul stabs it towards backward point, straight at the fielder
a touch fuller this time, Chanderpaul moves close to the line of the ball and drives the ball towards sweeper cover to bring up the 50 stand
in the corridor outside off, played off the backfoot towards backward point
way outside off, he'll have to re-bowl that one
angling in from round the wicket, Chanderpaul gets a bit of an outside edge towards third man

a shortish ball on leg, Bravo was eyeing the deep square leg region as he attempted the pull, edges it onto his hip, rubs the area where the ball struck as he hobbles through for a single, physio takes a look
length ball just outside off, twirled towards midwicket for a single
a Dwayne Bravo special, the inside-out lofted drive over extra cover, that's one of his best strokes, this delivery is overpitched a touch and Bravo smashes this one

looks to repeat the shot, head falls away as he plays it, the ball goes a lot squarer this time, Langeveldt charges in and pouches the catch at sweeper cover but the ball pops out of his hands as he hits the ground
pushed to mid-off, where the fielder slides to cut off the ball
moves across and plays the ball towards short fine

Chanderpaul would have faced plenty of cricticism if he had got out playing that shot, he attempts a reverse-paddle off a fast bowler, gets it off the toe end of the bat and the ball fortuitously lands between cover and backward point
length ball, Bravo backs away to make room and carves the ball towards deep backward point where David Miller fields
mistimes an on-the-up on-drive towards mid-on, that's a dot ball

Bravo is definitely shifting gears here, again he backs away a bit and clobbers this one over long-on for six, it went very high so there was some worry whether it would clear the rope, but it does by a long way, that was a slower offcutter from Morkel
responds with a quick bouncer, Bravo ducks under it awakwardly, front foot is in the air as he bends
gets it towards square leg for a single
swings a shortish ball behind square leg for a single
fullish ball, played uppishly towards deep midwicket for a couple
attempts a reverse-sweep, trying to get the ball very fine past the keeper, no contact
whipped towards deep midwicket, close to the fielder so just a single this time
pitching back of a length and angling into the batsman, who looks to make room but is cramped, defends it to the off side
slower delivery does the trick, Bravo is gone, he plays down the wrong line and middle stump is knocked back
well outside off, carved behind point by Chanderpaul
shortish ball just outside off, Bravo chops it in front of point to get off the mark
keeps it close to offstump, Chanderpaul stabs it behind point
fired in quicker, on middle and leg, whipped towards backward square leg
flighted a touch, Chanderpaul yorks himself as he charges down the track, defended back to the bowler
clips the legstump ball, clipped to square leg for a single to bring up a laboured half-century
tossed up, driven firmly towards deep extra cover, some sharp running fetches them a couple
reverse-swept down to the short third man
fired into the pads, tucked in front of square leg for a single that brings up the 200
another reverse-sweep, from well outside leg stump, gets it away towards deep point
jabbed down towards long-on for a single, he was dancing down the track and moving towards legstump but Duminy followed him
lashed towards deep extra cover by Darren Bravo, where there's a bit of a misfield from McLaren but they would have got back for two anyway
again Chanderpaul's attempts to make room fail as the bowler fires it into legstump, he digs it out towards mid-on, Langeveldt has to come in from the rope to field that so the batsmen get two
full and just outside off, the reverse-sweep finally pays dividends, he powers it to the third man boundary
and again, even better this time, doesn't bother with keeping it on the ground this time, the ball bounce thrice before rolling over the third man boundary
full toss and way down the leg side, no chance for de Villiers to collect it and that's five runs for West Indies
again down the leg side, strikes Chanderpaul on the pads and rolls away for a leg bye
shortish delivery outside off, Darren Bravo cuts it straight to the fielder at backward point
ovrpitched and just outside off, punched back past the bowler for a single
not too short, just outside off, Bravo flat bats it towards long-on
end of Chanderpaul, just as he was shifting to a higher gear, he looks to pull a shortish ball but can get it only as far as Tsotsobe at deep midwicket
a bouncer from McLaren well outside off, Bravo started to duck anyway before realising it was well wide of him
length ball outside off, Bravo attempts a footwork-free slash at it, misses
jabs this one towards cover to get a single
that one homes in towards offstump, jagged in after bouncing outside off, Pollard manages to get a bottom egde on it, the ball bounces over middle stump, what a delivery to face first up
Bravo was backing away so the bowler sent it well outside off stump, too far outside off to be legal
again Bravo is moving away from legstump, throws his bat at an outside off delivery, gets an edge past the keeper to third man
opens the face to steer the ball down to third man for a single
short of length ball outside off, carved behind a diving Duminy at backward point, Amla has to run around from third man to cut it off
short of length on legstump, off the thigh pad towards short fine leg

West Indies get two runs when they shouldn't have got any,  a flail from Bravo ends up dribbling towards the keeper, who throws down the stumps, the batsman take a single as the ball ricochets, de Villiers races forward and  throws at the stumps again, there's no one backing up, so he gives away another run
short of length delivery outside off, Darren Bravo cuts it to point
gets forward and defends towards midwicket
shortish ball, Pollard brings out the pull, placement isn't great, so there's just a single on offer
short ball angling across the batsman, who tries to slog it but misses
length ball on offstump, steered towards backward point for a single
overpitched delivery outside off, Pollard attempts a booming drive but mistimes it towards wide long-on
shortish ball on offstump, Pollard tries to pull it but can't quite get hold of it and the ball rolls to midwicket
overpitched ball is drilled towards extra cover by Bravo
a one-handed six from Bravo! it was a slower delivery, back of a length, Bravo swings hard at it and it has the legs to clear long-off
slashed towards sweeper cover this time by Bravo
a wide down the leg side from Morkel
length ball on middle and off, tucked towards midwicket by Pollard
a powerful flat-batted hit down the ground from Bravo, backs away and muscles it, hit uppishly but straight enough to beat long-off
a super yorker to end the over, Bravo blocks it out to the off side and nips through for a single
overpitched and outside off, makes a bit of room and cracks that through cover for four, lovely stroke from Bravo
a touch slower, follows the batsman as he moves away from leg, defended towards the off side
a swinging yorker from Langeveldt, Pollard keeps it out and zips through for a single
the on-drive isn't too well-timed by Bravo, it was again very full from Langeveldt, Bravo gets a couple
backs away this time, hits the length ball towards cover
fullish ball, Pollard gets it off the inside-half of the bat towards deep midwicket, gets a single or his efforts
McLaren starts the over with a yorker outside legstump, Pollard drives it along the ground to long-on, wanted two but has to settle for a single
again it's a yorker down the leg side, Bravo has no room to play a big shot, he squeezes the ball towards point
very full from McLaren, just outside off, punched back to the bowler by Pollard, that's a dot ball
slips in the bouncer, Pollard pulls but can't beat Duminy at deep midwicket,three off the first four deliveries this over
reverts to the full deliveries, this one is a low full toss just outside leg, Bravo again skips away from leg and gets the ball towards point
finishes a solid over with another full delivery, whipped towards deep midwicket
a monster hit from Pollard, Langeveldt is a touch short as he goes for the yorker, smoked over long-on for six
this is short and wide, Pollard cracks it over cover for four and the 50 partnership is up
six more, Pollard is turning it on here, again Langeveldt misses as he goes for the blockhole, errs again and it turns into a full toss which is clubbed over long-on for six
gets the yorker right on the third attempt, its spot-on and Pollard's cameo is over, he can't keep that one out and it smashes into the base of legstump, this is one action-packed over

Langeveldt is making a superb comeback after being smashed for 16 off the first three deliveries, Sammy is bowled first ball after he winds up for a big hit only to find the ball has kept lower than he expects, offstump takes a beating, Langeveldt on a hat-trick
length ball outside legstump, Bernard edges it towards short fine leg for a single
length ball angling into offstunmp, Bernard gets it away just past the right of the bowler
yorker outside off is dug out towards backward point
another pinpoint yorker, outside leg stump this time, Bravo blocks it towards midwicket
short ball sits up outside leg stump, easy put away for Bernard, who hammers it behind square leg for four
middle stump yorker from McLaren, driven past the bowler for a single

fractional mistake in the length as the bowler aims for the yorker, it turns into a low full toss and Bravo plays that one inside out between cover and extra cover for four, 300 within touching distance now
full and just outside off, Bernard was backing away and the ball was angling across him, he doesn't offer a shot
another full ball, this one is forced down the ground for a couple
a full toss on middle stump is hit towards midwicket, takes West Indies to 299
keeps firing in the yorkers, Bravo gets it away behind point for a couple, the big crowd erupts as the 300 comes up
eased towards extra cover for a single
a yorker on legstump to finish, Bernard swings and gets it to short fine leg for a single, West Indies end on 303

inn2.comm: first ball is on a length, defended back down the pitch
short and down the leg side, that wide gets South Africa off the mark
short and wide outside off, dabbed towards backward point
fullish ball on offstump, clipped towards midwicket for his first runs
length ball heading on middle stump line, Smith is hit high on the pad as he looks to defend that one
short of length and just outside off, defended to the off side
a touch slower from Bernard, Smith plays it uppishly but wide of short cover to get a single
Amla is off the mark straightway, cracking the ball past point
overpitched this time, a cracking square drive from Amla, Dwyane Bravo makes an athletic stop in front of point
fullish outside off, driven firmly to sweeper cover, where Dwayne Bravo waits
defended this time towards extra cover by Amla
length ball outside off, gets it off the inside-half of the bat towards midwicket
short of length and just outside off, deftly dabbed to third man for a single
Bernard starts the over with another wayward delivery down the leg side
legstump line, Amla tucks it to deep backward square leg
length ball outside off, jabbed towards point by Smith
similar length on legstump, Smith moves across and tries to guide it past short fine leg but can't get the timing right
overpitched on middle and off, defended off the front foot
slightly slower delivery, fullish and on offstump, punched back towards the bowler
shorter this time, another dot ball as Smith taps the ball towards cover
Amla stands tall and drives towards mid-on, a length ball heading for middle
fuller and outside off, again Amla drives elegantly towards sweeper cover, a good field set this by West Indies
clipped off the thigh pad towards deep backward square leg for a single
Amla gets forward and drives to sweeper cover again, Dwayne Bravo fields the third ball in a row
back of length and outside off, Smith skips away from the stumps and jabs the  ball towards cover
a very full delivery outside leg, off Smith's pads towards square leg

not too well timed by Smith but even on the shot to get four, this was a short of length ball, Smith sashays down the track and lofts the ball over mid-on though he didn't get to the pitch of the ball
opens the face to guide the ball towards backward point
full toss on the pads, tucked towards deep midwicket by Smith
in the channel outside off, Smith steers the ball towards third man
just outside off, Amla gets the ball away towards third man for a single
an another single to finish off the over, Smith pats the ball towards point
short ball, Smith goes for the pull, stands tall and helps it towards deep square leg
Amla shuffles across the stumps and flicks the ball from well outside off towards midwicket, cant beat the fielder
short ball, punished by Amla, a front-foot pull that lands just inside the rope, super shot that
better line and length this time, Amla defends it towards Pollard at backward point
short and wide, Amla mistimes a flat-batted shot towards extra cover
low full toss heading for leg stump, eased to mid-on and a tight single is pinched
slower delivery, Amla tucks it to mid wicket
Smith makes room and tries to chop a ball from outside off past point but can't beat the fielder
too short from Bernard, a hit-me delivery, Smith slogs it to his favourite deep midwicket region to pick up four runs
fullish ball outside leg, Smith was backing away and that delivery cramped him up, he bunts it towards mid-on, and has to scramble to complete the run
threads it through a packed off-side field, back of a length and outside off, Amla square-drives it beautifully for four
full and wide, Amla waits and guides it to third man for a single
Bravo starts with a slow delivery, short of length heading for off, turned to the leg side for a single
similar delivery, which turns into a legstump ball for the left-hand batsman, whipped towards deep midwicket
that one bounces a touch, Amla steers it down to third man for a single
legstump delivery, immediately one of the short midwickets is in action, Pollard stopping a Smith clip to the leg side

Smith is a long way outside leg stump when he tries to force the ball, gets it onto his boot and drags it towards the keeper, Smith has the awareness to get where the ball is heading and gets his foot back in the crease before Ramdin takes off the bails
fuller length delivery on off, Smith drives it to sweeper cover
slow delivery to start, loopy and overpitched outside off, Amla drives it towards backward point
much shorter this time, Amla drops his wrists as he gets the ball towards point
the 50 stand comes up with a lovely chip over mid-off for six, an effortless strike from Amla, it was a touch overpitched and Amla capitalised
Amla gets a big stride in and plays a classical cover drive to get four more
length ball on middle and off, turned towards short fine leg by Amla
slanting down the leg side, off the pads towards short fine leg
the runs continue to flow, Smith whips the first delivery towards deep fine leg
fullish on middle and leg, Amla shuffles across and works it towards deep square leg

the slower offcutter does the job, what a superb delivery gets rid of Smith, that one turned sharply after pitching outside leg, goes on to beat Smith and hit middle stump, an offspinner will be proud of that delivery
greets Kallis with a bouncer, Kallis goes for a flashy pull first up, misses the ball

short and wide, Kallis goes for the cut, gets an under-edge past the keeper, Sammy fools the batsmen into thinking he has the ball when it is actually Bernard who does the fielding a little behind him, Sammy slides and acts as though he is throwing the ball, when Bernard is yet to collect the ball, the crowd loves it
short and wide, Amla says thank you and spanks it through cover for four to end the over
back of a length delivery angling in, Kallis defends it to the leg side
Kallis gets on the front foot and pushes it to mid-on
back of length delivery, Kallis tucks it to midwicket
way outside off stump
defended off the backfoot to mid-on
gets forward and defends this time, towards cover
Amla gets a single off the final delivery of the over by dabbing the ball towards third man
Amla drives the first ball towards cover
full ball on offstump, driven towards mid-on by Kallis
a good-looking pull for one run, Kallis swivels as he sends the short ball towards deep square leg
length ball just outside off, opens the face and works the ball in front of point
played with soft hands towards backward point, it was a delivery well outside off stump
short ball is dispatched to midwicket for four, Kallis pulls powerfully and the ball nearly carries all the way, lands a few yards short
tossed up outside off and Amla just squirts this past backward point, short third man chases
stays back and cuts to point
flighted on middle and leg and worked to short fine leg
gets forward and drives through the line to mid-off
stays back and chops it down to point
tossed up on middle and leg and worked to square leg
times it crisply off the front foot and mid-on slides and cuts it off
slower ball outside off and dabbed to short third man
stays back and punches him down to long-off
stays back and punches off the backfoot but finds backward point
punches it with a straight bat down the ground to long-off
punches firmly through the off side and it just beats extra cover's reach, Rampaul mops up
nice, loopy delivery from Benn, gets the outside edge which takes the ball towards point
a bit of width, Amla slaps the ball to deep point to bring up his half-century
a powerful slog-sweep for six, bends his knee and deposits it over midwicket
flighted delivery heading for legstump, dug out by Kallis towards the bowler
well outside off, cracked towards sweeper cover
played with soft hands towards point
legstump delivery, clipped towards midwicket
on offstump this time, Amla plays it to midwicket where Pollard fields
beats Pollard this time, it was on the pads and Amla flicked it to the leg iside
powerfully swept by Kallis, but Trvis Dowlin makes an athletic stop at point to keep the runs down to a single
comes down the track and pushes the ball back towards the bowler
stands tall and drives towards cover, doesn't beat the fielder
tossed up this time, hit Kallis low on the pad outside off as he goes for the sweep, lbw appeal is turned down
left alone outside off
a full delivery is swept from just outside off, makes contact this time, gets it down to fine leg
Amla sweeps a low full toss down to fine leg for a run
quicker and shorter, Kallis is surprised by that one, he shuffles across the stumps and defends awkwardly
pushed down the ground to long-on for a single
down the leg side, helped along to fine leg for a quick two
Kallis plays the sweep which he has favoured all innings today, gets a bit of an edge and the ball flies to deep square leg but land safe
pushes it to cover point
eased down to long-on for a single, no hassles for South Africa at this stage, there's a direct hit from the deep, South Africa take an overthrow from the ricochet
again worked down to long-on for a single
paddle-sweep from Amla, it was a flighted, full delivery just outside off
length ball heading for off, punched back to the bowler
Kallis takes his eye off the ball as he paddles it fine from well outside off
length ball outside off, crisply driven towards extra cover
tucked towards deep midwicket for another run, all too easy for South Africa here
overpitched on the pads, driven down to long-on for a single to end the over
short and wide outside off, Amla cuts but straight to backward point
fuller and on the stumps, whipped towards wide long-on
down the leg side, helped along to fine leg for two more
tries to flick the ball from just outside off but misses
backs away and cuts the ball towards backward point
nudged towards deep midwicket to get another single, South Africa maintaining the run-rate without taking risks here
length ball on off, played towards backward point
a wristy whip sends the ball along towards deep midwicket
length ball heading for offstump, driven down to long-off for a single
one of the few false strokes from Amla, he wanted to drive that thrpough extra cover, gets an inside edge past legstump to short fine
intentionally worked towards short fine for a single this time
Kallis stands tall and drives towards cover, can't beat the field, that's a tidy over from Sammy, only three off it
driven all along the ground towards long-on
from outside off, Kallis paddle-sweeps again
on legstump, Amla clips it towards short midwicket, where Pollard makes a diving stop
Kallis moves across the stumps and worls a ball from outside off to square leg
well outside off stump but just within the allowable limit, Amla offers no stroke
Kallis drives a length delivery towards mid-off and takes an easy single
lovely stroke from Amla, he's in top form here, not too short form Rampaul, but Amla swivels and swings that one to midwicket for four
drops the ball down towards third man for a single
Kallis comes down the track and works a ball from just outside off towards backward square leg
again Kallis takes a couple of steps down the track, seeing which Rampaul slips in the bouncer, forcing Kallis to take evasive action
the bouncer doesn't dissuade from skipping down the track again, he punches the ball towards extra cover to make it nine off the over
fullish and outside off, defended towards the off side
just outside off, clipped behind square leg for two, Dowlin doesn't pick up the ball cleanly giving away the extra run
driven firmly back to the bowler, Gayle moves to his left to cut that off
tucked behind square leg for a single
stands tall and drives it to the right of the bowler
beaten, it was a length ball outside off, he looked to steer it to third man but the ball slips in between bat and pad and goes through to the keeper
clipped towards midwicket by Amla
width provided, Amla driven crisply towards sweeper cover, Dale Richards does well to stop the ball in the deep
low full toss outside off, dug out towards backward point where Sammy first misfields to give away a run, that was a regulation stop, to top it off he gives away some overthrows
Kallis chops the ball towards backward point, Sammy fields cleanly this time but a horrendous throw on seeing Amla backing up gives away four overthrows
a yorker from Rampaul, squeezed out towards backward square leg, and the runs continue to come easy for South Africa
worked away behind square for a single
overpitched and outside off, driven down to long-off for a single
shuffles across the stumps and clips the ball behind square leg
guided to backward point where Dwayne Bravo fields
driven towards cover, where the fielder has to move across a few yards to stop the ball, giving time to take the single
again Amla moves across the stumps and works the ball towards backward square leg, gets a couple which brings up the 100 partnership
starts with a length ball outside off, carved towards sweeper cover
back of a length and angling into legstump, Amla backs away and opens the face of the bat to get it past the keeper
Kallis walks across the stump and turns a ball from well outside off towards midwicket
back of a length and outside off, Kallis sashays down the track and pushes the ball towards cover
well outside off, Amla guides the ball to third man as he has so often this innings
again its wide, Kallis looks to muscle it through the off side, gets a bottom edge and the ball rolls towards point
easy single by pushing the ball towards cover
length ball just outside off, driven towards deep extra cover for one more
short and wide, lashed towards sweeper cover
full ball and outside off, driven firmly back to the bowler
Kallis brings up yet another half-century by getting yet another no-risk single after pushing the ball to long-on
Amla moves to 91 by glancing the ball towards short fine leg
shortish ball outside off, Amla carves it towards point
way outside off, poor delivery that, Amla cracks it behind backward point for a boundary
on offstump this time, defended back to the bowler
well outside off stump again, Amla steers the ball towards sweeper cover
back of a length ball in the channel, Kallis guides it towards third man for one more
full and wide, crunched to long-on for a single
tucks the ball towards square leg but can't beat the fielder
Amla makes his second hundred of the series, his sensational form continues, he brings up the milestone by carving the ball in his favourite backward point region and sprinting three

Kallis perishes to the shot he has used so often against the spinners this innings, gets a top-edge as he sweeps and Dowlin takes a smart catch at deep backward square leg to snap the huge partnership
drives a full length delivery towards sweeper cover
de Villiers dances down the track for his first delivery and drives Gayle to long-on
makes room and drives the ball towards cover
opens the face and guides the ball to backward point
length ball on middle and leg, tucked towards midwicket
outside legstump, flicked towards midwicket
on offstump, guided to third man yet again for a single
de Villiers take a leaf out of the Amla book and steers the ball to third man for a single
length ball on off, well-timed drive to cover, straight at the fielder, just two off the over
driven down to long-on for a single
eased down to long-on again, this time the drive is straighter and softer allowing time for the second
whipped from legstump towards midwicket
full toss and just outside off, makes room and plays it towards cover
yet another single, de Villiers turns the ball towards midwicket

a chance that really needed to be held, West Indies needed a wicket and that catch could have sent back Amla, an uncharacteristic awkward shot from Amla, a flat batted hit towards deep midwicket, Dale Richards thought he was under the ball near the boundary but realises he's a few feet off at the last moment and dives but doesn't even get a hand on it
slower delivery on off, de Villiers drives it back to the bowler
angling into the pads, de Villiers works it to backward square leg for a couple
full and outside off, punched towards extra cover
length ball into the pads, worked down the ground to long-on
Amla shuffles across the stumps and tucks the ball towards midwicket
overpitched ball is eased down to long-off for another single, South Africa continue to whittle down the runs required effortlessly
full ball blocked back towards the bowler
off the toe end of the bat and rolls towards the bowler
three dot balls in a row, de Villiers tucks it towards square leg
make it four in a row, this time midwicket does the fielding
driven down to long-on for a single this time
that was a superb over for West Indies till then, but Amla has spoiled it with a massive hit over wide long-on for six, came down the track and muscled that one
down the leg side, worked to deep midwicket for a single
springs the bouncer on him, Amla goes for the pull but gets a top edge which flies too fine for Bernard at fine leg
overpitched on legstump, easily picked off for another single towards square leg
slower delivery, again it is full, on middle and off, driven down to long-on for a single
shuffles across and nudges the ball from outside off behind square leg
speared down leg, eased along the ground to long-on for another run, and with South Africa in complete control, it's time for drinks
short of length and just outside off, defended towards the bowler
short and wide, slapped towards cover
again Gayle fields at cover to make it three dot balls in a row
driven along the ground to long-on for a single
fullish ball just outside off, slices it over point, a well-timed stroke fetches him four more
a well-disguised slower ball, Amla lets it go
comes down the track, checks his shot and dabs it towards third man
a yorker outside off, dug out towards the off side
fuller length delivery on off, de Villiers drives it to sweeper cover
Amla swings this one down the ground, mistimed but it doesn't carry to long-on
slower delivery outside off, de Villiers slices it straight to the fielder at point
short of length and down the leg side, off the pads and dribbles away, batsmen sneak a leg bye
whips that towards deep square leg for a single

that's the end of a superb innings from Amla, a slower ball from Pollard, Amla cracks it towards long-off, Bernard runs in and completes a simple catch, Amla is so tired he can barely trudge off to the dressing room
length ball outside off, driven gracefully to mid-off for a single
a dainty dab towards substitute Deonarine at third man for a single
a quick single is taken after de Villiers pushes the ball to Sammy at mid-on
short ball on middle and leg, swung towards midwicket where Gayle fields

de Villiers dances down the track and chips the ball over Kieron Pollard at midwicket, substitute Liam Sebastien gets round of applause from his home crowd after he makes a diving stop at the boundary
works the short ball to the midwicket to get a single
a bouncer from Sammy, Duminy gets under it
huge appeal for lbw, but that was missing off and had pitched outside leg as well
'Wait,' is the call after Duminy stands on his toes and punches the ball to extra cover
gets a run by steering the ball towards third man, retains the strike as well
and again third man has to field, Duminy opens the face to guide a ball across him to third man for a single
shuffles across and pulls a short ball towards deep backward square leg
short ball just outside off, pulled confidently to deep midwicket by Duminy
de Villiers takes a couple of paces down the track, doesn't reach the bounce of the ball so he defends to the leg side
well outside off, de Villiers bends his knees and tries to slog to the leg side, misses
on the pads, clipped down to third man for a single
a loopy full ball outside off, punched towards mid-off
tucks a legstump delivery towards deep square leg, thinks of the second but there's no time to get it
well outside leg stump, off the boot towards square leg
short ball down the leg side, Duminy pulls it down to fine leg
de Villiers continues to charge down the track, he pushes the ball to long-on and takes the single
another short ball on legstump is helped along to fine leg by Duminy
full ball angling across the batsman, punched towards mid-off
short ball outside off, dabbed towards backward point
back of a length ball heading for off, driven along the ground to mid-off
forced off the backfoot towards sweeper cover for another single
this time they get two after de Villiers places the ball wide of the man at sweeper cover
full and well outside off, de Villiers comes down the track and swings the ball towards wide long-on
on legstump, clipped towards deep square leg for a single
a high full toss just outside off, de Villiers looks to flick the ball towards the leg side but gets a leading edge towards mid-off
outside legstump, helped along to fine leg by Duminy
crowd gets excited after de Villiers drives the ball into the ground and to Gayle at cover, the fans thought it was a catch
length ball on middle, punched past the bowler for a single
on middle and leg, Duminy steers the ball to third man for a single
driven off the front foot along the pitch, Pollard moves quickly to his right to field
width provided, Duminy carves it towards cover for a single
on the pads, played with soft hands towards backward square leg
slower ball, full and on middle, chopped back towards the bowler
Duminy makes room and deflects the ball towards short third man
short ball heading down the leg side, de Villiers swat it towards deep square leg
driven all along the ground to long-off for a single
short of length ball heading for off, punched towards mid-on
de Villiers looks to swat a back of length ball, gets an inside-edge but it drops short of the keeper
slow loopy full delivery well outside off, de Villiers digs it out towards the bowler
short ball on middle and leg, Duminy goes for the pull but misses
not as short as the previous one, but on the shorter side, Duminy gets it down to fine leg
length ball on middle and leg, played with soft hands towards wide long-on for a couple
a tight single is taken after Duminy pushes the ball off the front foot towards extra cover

de Villiers looks to work a ball from outside off towards the leg side, he misses and the offcutters hits him on the elbow and rolls towards backward point, they appeal for lbw but that would have sailed over the stumps
fullish ball is whipped to deep backward square leg for another single
another tight single is taken, this time de Villiers makes room to smash a length ball to covers
Duminy takes a couple of steps down the track and turns the ball towards square leg for a single
Duminy looks to swat a short of length ball from outside off to midwicket, he misses and the ball goes through to the keeper
length ball just outside off, Duminy gives it a big heave, but can only get the ball to deep backward point
that's the boundary South Africa needed to release the pressure, a low toss outside off, de Villiers paddles it over short third man, well timed shot
a legstump yorker, de Villiers can only squeeze it out as far as the keeper, and they steal a single

back of length ball is flicked by Duminy to deep midwicket, Bravo isn't on the bpoundary, he's a few metres in, he jumps full-length and gets a hand on it but can't hold on it, the ball has been called a four though replays suggest it might have just carried over the rope
guides the final ball of the over to third man for a single
another drop>, this was a far simpler chance at deep midwicket, Duminy mows it straight to Darren Bravo who grasses a sitter
Duminy gets off the strike by pushing the ball to extra cover, he's lived a charmed life
de Villiers eases the nerves with a powerful sweep to deep square leg for four, no fielder had a chance of stopping that stroke
Pollard bowls this one from very wide, and he sprays it  down the leg side to give away some free runs
this is a much better delivery, on a length and heading for middle, flicked to deep midwicket for a couple
de Villiers brings up another half-century by backing away and crunching the ball over mid-off, that ball lands less than a yard inside the rope
de Villiers remains in imperious form, whipping the final ball of the over to deep midwicket for two more, that's 18 runs off the over
Duminy now tucks a length ball on middle to deep midwicket for a single
a yorker heading down the leg side, de Villiers makes room and chops it towards cover
a low full toss on offstump is driven back to the bowler
down the leg side again, easily helped to fine leg for a single
de Villiers was in a hurry to finish off the match, charges out of the crease but isn't sure how to play a shortish ball from Rampaul, he swishes at it but misses
a yorker from Rampaul, de Villiers punches it to mid-off to leave South Africa needing three runs off the final over
full and wide, de Villiers backs away and drives it towards Gayle at cover
appeal for lbw, but that one pitched outside leg, the ball rolls off the pads towards short third man, the scores are now level
fullish ball is driven firmly to Pollard at mid-on, no run taken
full and very wide, de Villiers thinks it should be called a wide after he fails to reach it, he has a wry grin when the umpire makes no call
the crowd goes bonkers as the game heads to the final ball, another wide yorker which de Villiers can't hit

4-0 to South Africa after a madcap finale, de Villiers swings the final ball to Darren Sammy at midwicket, who fumbles it, takes a few strides to collect it and then misses the stumps from a few yards out as de Villiers scrambles to make his ground, de Villiers isn't celebrating he's just relieved at the victory
